mapper.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS payments ( "paymentId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "purchaseId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "amount" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "currency" VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, "shopId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "account" VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, "loyaltyType" INTEGER, "paidPoint" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "paidToken" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "paidValue" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "feePoint" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "feeToken" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "feeValue" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "totalPoint" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "totalToken" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "totalValue" VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, "paymentStatus" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "contractStatus" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "openNewTimestamp" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "closeNewTimestamp" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "openCancelTimestamp" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "closeCancelTimestamp" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "openNewTxId" VARCHAR(66) DEFAULT '', "openNewTxTime" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "openCancelTxId" VARCHAR(66) DEFAULT '', "openCancelTxTime" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY ("paymentId") );

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tasks ( "taskId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "type" VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, "shopId" VARCHAR(66) NOT NULL, "account" VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, "name" VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, "currency" VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, "providePercent" INTEGER NOT NULL, "status" INTEGER NOT NULL, "taskStatus" INTEGER NOT NULL, "timestamp" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, "txId" VARCHAR(66) DEFAULT '', "txTime" INTEGER DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY ("taskId") );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS mobiles ( "account" VARCHAR(42) NOT NULL, "token" VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, "language" VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, "os" VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("account") );
